Just about...6 months anyways.

Well...
Kris cheated on me. AHA!!!! Ihope some girl bites his dick off...
THeres nothing more gross than walking in on your boyfriend fucking a fucking ugly ass slut...
I mean my god..i was right in the other room...if he wanted sex..he should have come to me...and THE GIRL WAS UGLY> i could see maybe if she was like hot blonde with big boobs...NO...ugly skanky white trash...well...thats what he is..so it mixes well.
Anyways...On the good side...Got promoted at Bombay to Assistant Manager...YES...finally....and goign to school...my life is finally getting in order...soon i'll be moving back out..but this time..my OWN apartment...no boyfriends no parents..YAY.
